mapper.select: select distinct * from prefer_genre_by_member_recommend where member_nickname = #{memberNickname}
select * from age_group_recommend where age_group = TRUNC((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(#{memberBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) / 10) * 10
select * from rating where member_id = #{memberId} and rating_score >= 3.0
select * from today_movie_list where rating_avg >= 2.5 and rating_count >= 10
mapper.insert: insert into today_recommend(movie_no, movie_name, movie_release_date, movie_nation, rating_avg, image_no, rating_count) values(#{movieNo}, #{movieName}, #{movieReleaseDate}, #{movieNation}, #{ratingAvg}, #{imageNo}, #{ratingCount})
